example_sentence_english: I am looking for an inexpensive vehicle.

example_sentence_italian: Aspetto un mezzo per il centro.
example_sentence_english: I am waiting for a vehicle to the city center.

example_sentence_italian: Il conducente del mezzo è gentile.
example_sentence_english: The driver of the vehicle is kind.
I walk up to the vehicle.
We give priority to the vehicles.

example_sentence_italian: Nel mezzo ci sono pochi posti.
example_sentence_english: There are few seats in the vehicle.
There is crowding on the vehicles.
I go with the company vehicle.
